title: Darkseed - Discography (1993-2005) [mp3@VBR]
description:
Darkseed was a German gothic metal band, active from 1992 to 2006. Lead vocalist Stefan Hertrich left the band in 2003, only to return in 2004 to make "Ultimate Darkness", which was released in 2005. In 2006, he and Martin Motnik left the band again, thus effectively forcing the band to disband. On 24.06.2008 on their official website they announced a reunion live @ Helion Festival on 4th of October 2008. <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Darkseed_%28German_band%29" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Darkseed_%28German_band%29</a>

Stefan Hertrich: Vocals, Electronics
Thomas Herrmann: Guitars
Tom Gilcher: Guitars
Martin Motnik: Bass
